question.text: The conducting part of the respiratory system is

options.text: The part starting with trachea up to the terminal bronchioles
The part starting with the external nostrils up to the terminal bronchioles
The part starting with the initial bronchioles up to the terminal bronchioles
The part starting with the external nostrils up to the respiratory bronchioles

solution.text: Respiratory system in human helps in conducting the fresh air and used air along with the exchange of gases (oxygen with carbon dioxide). Conducting part is the one that helps in transport of atmospheric fresh air and spent air. This part starts from the nostrils and extends upto the terminal bronchioles and post that is the exchange site in the alveoli sacs.
